name: bambenek-feed
label: Bambenek Feed
description:
Bambenek Consulting is an IT consulting firm focused on cybersecurity and cybercrime. This connector facilitates automated operations related to fetching the list of IP addresses/domains of feed families and ingestion of daily threat feeds.

This connector has a dependency on the Threat Intel Management Solution Pack. Install the Solution Pack before enabling ingestion of Threat Feeds from this source.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: Review the server URL of the Bambenek Feed server to which you will connect and retrieve data.

fields.title: Username
fields.name: username
fields.description: Username to access the Bambenek server to which you will connect and retrieve data.

fields.title: Password
fields.name: password
fields.description: Password to access the Bambenek server to which you will connect and retrieve data.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.

operations.title: Fetch Indicators
operations.description: Fetches the Threat Intel Feeds from Bambenek using the Feeds Family type you have specified.

parameters.title: High-Confidence Families Only
parameters.name: high_confidence

true.title: Feed Family Type
true.name: feed_family_types
true.tooltip: Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial licenses are C2 IP and C2 Domain.
true.description: Select the feed family type that you want to retrieve from Bambenek. If you have selected the High-Confidence Families Only option (set to true), then you can choose from the following types: DGA Domain, C2 All Indicator, C2 Domain, or C2 IP.

false.title: Feed Family Type
false.name: feed_family_types
false.tooltip: Note: Supported feed family types for Non-Commercial licenses are C2 IP and C2 Domain.
false.description: Select Bambenek feed family type to fetch specific feed listed IPs/domain. If you have cleared the High-Confidence Families Only option (set to false), then you can choose from the following types: DGA Domain, C2 All Indicator, C2 Domain, C2 IP, Phishing Domain, Malware Domain, or Sinkhole.

parameters.tooltip: Select this option if you want to fetch specific Bambenek feed family types as high confidence IPs/domain. For example, if you select DGA Domain as the feed family type and select the High-Confidence Families Only option, then this operation fetches "High-Confidence DGA Domain Feeds" from Bambenek.
parameters.description: Select the feed family type that you want to retrieve from Bambenek. For example, if you select DGA Domain as the feed family type and select the High-Confidence Families Only option, then this operation fetches "High-Confidence DGA Domain Feeds" from Bambenek.

parameters.title: Process Response As
parameters.name: output_mode
options: Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR
parameters.tooltip: Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option).
parameters.description:
Select the method of returning the Feed Data information. You can choose between the data being created as "Feed records" in FortiSOAR (the Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR option) or data being returned in the JSON format (the Return as a JSON option). 
If you choose the 'Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR' option, then in the Record Creation Playbook IRI field, specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.

Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.title: Record Creation Playbook IRI
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.description: Specify the IRI of the playbook that creates feed records in FortiSOAR.
Create as Feed Records in FortiSOAR.name: create_pb_id
